meanings: (다듬고 고침) (formal) modification, amendment, revise, change, (formal) modify, amend, revise

vlive.korean: [미션을 성공시켜 소원 룰렛을 수정하라!] 강태현! [Succeed mission to change the wish roulette!] TAEHYUN! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
vlive.english: [Succeed mission to change the wish roulette!] TAEHYUN!

vlive.korean: [과연 투모로우바이투게더는 무사히 소원을 수정할 수 있을까?] [Could TOMORROW X TOGETHER change their wish?] View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
vlive.english: [Could TOMORROW X TOGETHER change their wish?]

vlive.korean: [소원을 수정하기 위한 투모로우바이투게더의 좌충우돌 미션 수행기] 성공 성공? [Story of accomplishing mission to change wish by TOMORROW X TOGETHER] Success? Success? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
vlive.english: [Story of accomplishing mission to change wish by TOMORROW X TOGETHER] Success? Success?

vlive.korean: 그럼 다음 룰렛칸 수정 해보러 가볼까요? Shall we go to change the sections on the wheel? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.22
vlive.english: Shall we go to change the sections on the wheel?

vlive.korean: [이대로 소원 수정의 기회를 잃는 것인가...] 여기 몇 명이 들어갈 수 있어요? [Will they lose the chance to adjust a wish section?] How many can stand on this? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.22
vlive.english: [Will they lose the chance to adjust a wish section?] How many can stand on this?

examples.korean: AID or artificial insemination by a donor 발음듣기 AID, 즉 기증자를 통한 인공 수정 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: AID or artificial insemination by a donor 발음

examples.korean: The male sperm fertilizes the female egg. 발음듣기 남성의 정자가 여성의 난자를 수정시킨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The male sperm fertilizes the female egg. 발음

examples.korean: The sex of the embryo is predetermined at fertilization. 발음듣기 태아의 성별은 수정 때 이미 결정된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sex of the embryo is predetermined at fertilization. 발음

examples.korean: artificial insemination by a donor, abbreviated to ‘AID’ 발음듣기 약어로는 ‘AID’라고 하는, 기증자에 의한 인공 수정 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: artificial insemination by a donor, abbreviated to ‘AID’ 발음

examples.korean: Immediately after fertilization, the cells of the egg divide. 발음듣기 수정 직후에 난자의 세포들은 분열을 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Immediately after fertilization, the cells of the egg divide. 발음
